`nichts` is a nix profile wrapper with pacman-like syntax.

## Prerequisites

- [Nix Package Manager](https://nixos.org/download/)

## Installation

```bash
nix profile add github:k3tzchen/nichts
```

or

```bash
#build it yourself
git clone https://github.com/k3tzchen/nichts.git
cd ./nichts
cargo build --release
```

## Contributing

`nichts` is an **opinionated** and **personal** project built fully by myself.

Feel free to fork this project,
or if you find a bug **please open an issue**.

But for now there will be no contributions.
